channel.title: NPC help needed! 317 delta (VERRY COMPLEX!)
channel.description: ok, so ive spanned, set drops and now they walk around. but im making a traing place in castle wars and i wants two teams of npcs to fight eachother. how would i make them randomly start fighting a type of npc that is near them?

I don’t use delta so I can’t be of any use to you sorry.
